title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Mon May 21, 2018 | 7:02am EDT Editors Choice Pictures
Deaf and hard of hearing people perform a Buddhist Guanyin Thousand Hand dance to mark National Day for Helping the Disabled in Kunming, Yunnan province, China. REUTERS/Wong Campion Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Deaf and hard of hearing people perform a Buddhist Guanyin Thousand Hand dance to mark National Day for Helping the Disabled in Kunming, Yunnan province, China. REUTERS/Wong Campion Close 1 / 24
Lava flows into the Pacific Ocean, southeast of Pahoa, Monday, May 21, 2018 Lava flows into the Pacific Ocean, southeast of Pahoa, 2 / 24
Venezuela's President Nicolas Maduro stands with supporters during a gathering after the results of the election were released, outside of the Miraflores Palace in Caracas. REUTERS/Carlos Garcia Rawlins 21, 2018 Venezuela's President Nicolas Maduro stands with supporters during a gathering after the results of the election were released, outside of the Miraflores Palace in Caracas. REUTERS/Carlos Garcia Rawlins Close 3 / 24
A Star Jet business plane that veered off the runway at the Taizhou International Airport is seen lifted in Yangzhou, Jiangsu Monday, May 21, 2018 A Star Jet business plane that veered off the runway at the Taizhou International Airport is seen lifted in Yangzhou, Jiangsu
Janet Jackson performs at the 2018 Billboard Music Awards. REUTERS/Mario Anzuoni 21, 2018 Janet Jackson performs at the 2018 Billboard Music Awards. REUTERS/Mario Anzuoni Close 5 / 24
Ten roses are left in memory of the victims killed in a shooting at the Santa Fe High School in Santa Fe, Texas. REUTERS/Jonathan Bachman Reuters / Sunday, May 20, 2018 Ten roses are left in memory of the victims killed in a shooting at the Santa Fe High School in Santa Fe, Texas. REUTERS/Jonathan Bachman Close 6 / 24
A player stands and watches as spectators throw flares on the pitch during the Polish Championship match between Legia Warszawa and Lech Poznan in Poznan, Poland. Agencja Gazeta/Piotr Skornicki via REUTERS 21, 2018 A player stands and watches as spectators throw flares on the pitch during the Polish Championship match between Legia Warszawa and Lech Poznan in Poznan, Poland. Agencja Gazeta/Piotr Skornicki via REUTERS Close 7 / 24
Egyptian Muslims perform evening prayers called "Tarawih" inside Al Sultan Hassan mosque during the Muslim holy fasting month of Ramadan in the old Islamic area of Cairo, Egypt. REUTERS/Amr Abdallah Dalsh 21, 2018 Egyptian Muslims perform evening prayers called "Tarawih" inside Al Sultan Hassan mosque during the Muslim holy fasting month of Ramadan in the old Islamic area of Cairo, Egypt. REUTERS/Amr Abdallah Dalsh Close 8 / 24
Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry reacts after a play during the third quarter against the Houston Rockets in game three of the NBA Western conference finals. Kyle Terada-USA TODAY Sports 21, 2018 Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry reacts after a play during the third quarter against the Houston Rockets in game three of the NBA Western conference finals. Kyle Terada-USA TODAY Sports Close 9 / 24
Lieutenant Colonel Charles Anthony, of the Hawaii National Guard, measures sulfur dioxide gas levels at a lava flow on Highway 137 southeast of Pahoa Monday, May 21, 2018 Lieutenant Colonel Charles Anthony, of the Hawaii National Guard, measures sulfur dioxide gas levels at a lava flow on Highway 137 southeast of Pahoa 10 / 24
Raphael Diaz of Switzerland looks dejected after losing to Sweden in the IIHF gold medal match in Copenhagen. REUTERS/David W Cerny Reuters / Sunday, May 20, 2018 Raphael Diaz of Switzerland looks dejected after losing to Sweden in the IIHF gold medal match in Copenhagen. REUTERS/David W Cerny Close 11 / 24
Director Hirokazu Kore-eda reacts after winning the Palme d'Or award for his film "Shoplifters". REUTERS/Stephane Mahe Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Director Hirokazu Kore-eda reacts after winning the Palme d'Or award for his film "Shoplifters". REUTERS/Stephane Mahe Close 12 / 24
Lava erupts on the outskirts of Pahoa Saturday, May 19, 2018 Lava erupts on the outskirts of Pahoa 13 / 24
Mike Smith aboard Justify wins the 143rd running Preakness race at Pimlico Race Course. Amber Searls-USA TODAY Sports Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Mike Smith aboard Justify wins the 143rd running Preakness race at Pimlico Race Course. Amber Searls-USA TODAY Sports Close 14 / 24
Britain's Prince Harry and his wife Meghan ride a horse-drawn carriage after their wedding ceremony at St George's Chapel in Windsor Castle. REUTERS/Benoit Tessier Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Britain's Prince Harry and his wife Meghan ride a horse-drawn carriage after their wedding ceremony at St George's Chapel in Windsor Castle. REUTERS/Benoit Tessier Close 15 / 24
Girls' faces are covered by white powder after blowing it, at a town fiesta parlour game, in celebration of patron saint Santa Rita de Cascia in Baclaran, Paranaque City, Metro Manila, Philippines. REUTERS/Romeo Ranoco Reuters / Sunday, May 20, 2018 Girls' faces are covered by white powder after blowing it, at a town fiesta parlour game, in celebration of patron saint Santa Rita de Cascia in Baclaran, Paranaque City, Metro Manila, Philippines. REUTERS/Romeo Ranoco Close 16 / 24
Meghan Markle walks down the aisle as she arrives in St George's Chapel at Windsor Castle for her wedding to Prince Harry. Danny Lawson/Pool via REUTERS Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Meghan Markle walks down the aisle as she arrives in St George's Chapel at Windsor Castle for her wedding to Prince Harry. Danny Lawson/Pool via REUTERS Close 17 / 24
Spain's Rafael Nadal in action during his semi final match against Serbia's Novak Djokovic at the Italian Open. REUTERS/Tony Gentile Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Spain's Rafael Nadal in action during his semi final match against Serbia's Novak Djokovic at the Italian Open. REUTERS/Tony Gentile Close 18 / 24
A general view of smoke over the stadium after Eintracht Frankfurt fans set off flares before the start of the second half against Bayern Munich. REUTERS/Hannibal Hanschke Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 A general view of smoke over the stadium after Eintracht Frankfurt fans set off flares before the start of the second half against Bayern Munich. REUTERS/Hannibal Hanschke Close 19 / 24
Lee Selby in action against Josh Warrington during the IBF World Featherweight Title match in Leeds, Britain. Action Images via Reuters/Peter Cziborra Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Lee Selby in action against Josh Warrington during the IBF World Featherweight Title match in Leeds, Britain. Action Images via Reuters/Peter Cziborra Close 20 / 24
A Catholic worshipper lights a candle at the Basilica of the National Shrine of Our Lady of Aparecida in Aparecida do Norte, Brazil. REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker Reuters / Sunday, May 20, 2018 A Catholic worshipper lights a candle at the Basilica of the National Shrine of Our Lady of Aparecida in Aparecida do Norte, Brazil. REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker Close
Residents wade through a flooded street in Hamerweyne district of Mogadishu, Somalia. REUTERS/Feisal Omar Reuters / Sunday, May 20, 2018 Residents wade through a flooded street in Hamerweyne district of Mogadishu, Somalia. REUTERS/Feisal Omar Close
 Markle depart from St George's Chapel. Owen Humphreys/Pool via REUTERS Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Markle depart from St George's Chapel. Owen Humphreys/Pool via REUTERS Close 23 / 24
 Markle kiss on the steps of St George's Chapel after their wedding. Ben Birchall/Pool via REUTERS Reuters / Saturday, May 19, 2018 Markle kiss on the steps of St George's Chapel after their wedding. Ben Birchall/Pool via REUTERS Close
